item.title: Apple opposes order to unlock San Bernardino iPhone
item.ExtractedText: 1 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A police officer places a marker along East San Bernardino Avenue, near where the shootout occurred. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Law enforcement officers search a residential area for suspects who fled after the shooting. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Police search for the suspects in San Bernardino. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting The residential area was not far from where the shooting occurred. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Law enforcement officers search a neighborhood in San Bernardino. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A police officer loads his weapon while pursuing suspects. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A SWAT team mobilizes during the search. Hide Caption 8 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting People pray on the San Bernardino Golf Course, across the street from where the shooting took place. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Heavily armed law enforcement officers swarmed the area where the shooting occurred. Hide Caption 10 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting People leave a community center after reuniting with friends and family in the aftermath of the shootings. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A woman is comforted near the scene of the shooting. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A police helicopter hovers around the Inland Regional Center. Hide Caption 13 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Luis Gutierrez gets emotional as he talks about his wife who works in the facility and saw a gunman, according to Los Angeles Times photographer Marcus Yam. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Two women speak with a firefighter at a triage area near the scene. Hide Caption 15 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Police stand guard outside of the emergency room at the Loma Linda University Medical Center, where some of the victims were being treated. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Police escort civilians away from the site of the shooting. Hide Caption 17 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting People walk away from the scene. It is unclear how many people were at the facility at the time of the shooting. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Police in SWAT gear secure the area. Hide Caption 19 of 29 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Two women embrace at a community center where family members were gathering to pick up people from the scene. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting People gather at the San Bernardino Golf Course. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting People talk to police at the golf course. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A woman is wheeled away on a stretcher. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting People are moved away from the area by bus. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Police and fire personnel are seen near the site of the shooting. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A crowd gathers behind the police line. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting Ambulances pull out of a staging area near the Inland Regional Center. Hide Caption 29 photos: San Bernardino shooting A SWAT vehicle carries police officers. Hide Caption
